entries.content: Covid-19, a global pandemic where everyone was in lockdown for a year. A lot of social isolation. There were riots over police brutality. There was controversy over masking and mask mandates. Social distancing became a known phrase. Flatten the curve related to spreading out deaths and minimize the impact on the healthcare system. Over a million people died globally. Society is still adjusting to isolating for a year.
